ps3.6:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti—
ps3.6:2.3: ekopi hutva bahudha hoti, bahudhapi hutva eko hoti;
ps3.6:3.3: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti.
ps3.6:3.4: So bahuncepi adisati, tatheva tam hoti, no annatha.
ps3.6:3.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco na heva kho nimittena adisati, api ca kho manussanam va amanussanam va devatanam va saddam sutva adisati—
ps3.6:3.6: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti.
ps3.6:3.7: So bahuncepi adisati, tatheva tam hoti, no annatha.
ps3.6:3.8: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco na heva kho nimittena adisati, napi manussanam va amanussanam va devatanam va saddam sutva adisati, api ca kho vitakkayato vicarayato vitakkavippharasaddam sutva adisati—
ps3.6:3.9: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti.
ps3.6:3.10: So bahuncepi adisati, tatheva tam hoti, no annatha.
ps3.6:3.11: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco na heva kho nimittena adisati, napi manussanam va amanussanam va devatanam va saddam sutva adisati, napi vitakkayato vicarayato vitakkavippharasaddam sutva adisati, api ca kho avitakkam avicaram samadhim samapannassa cetasa ceto paricca pajanati—
ps3.6:3.12: ‘yatha imassa bhoto manosankhara panihita imassa cittassa anantara amukam nama vitakkam vitakkayissati’ti.
ps3.6:3.13: So bahuncepi adisati, tatheva tam hoti, no annatha.
ps3.6:4.4: Evam manasi karotha, ma evam manasakattha.
ps3.6:5.3: Ye tena nekkhammena samannagata, sabbe te visuddhacitta anavilasankappati—
ps3.6:5.5: “Tam kho pana nekkhammam evam asevitabbam, evam bhavetabbam, evam bahulikatabbam, evam tadanudhammata sati upatthapetabba”ti—
ps3.6:6.3: Ye tena abyapadena samannagata, sabbe te visuddhacitta anavilasankappati—
ps3.6:6.5: “So kho pana abyapado evam asevitabbo, evam bhavetabbo, evam bahulikatabbo, evam tadanudhammata sati upatthapetabba”ti—
ps3.6:7.3: Ye taya alokasannaya samannagata, sabbe te visuddhacitta anavilasankappati—
ps3.6:7.5: “Sa kho pana alokasanna evam asevitabba, evam bhavetabba, evam bahulikatabba, evam tadanudhammata sati upatthapetabba”ti—
ps3.6:8.3: Ye tena avikkhepena samannagata, sabbe te visuddhacitta anavilasankappati—
ps3.6:8.5: “So kho pana avikkhepo evam asevitabbo, evam bhavetabbo, evam bahulikatabbo, evam tadanudhammata sati upatthapetabba”ti—
ps3.6:9.3: Ye tena dhammavavatthanena samannagata, sabbe te visuddhacitta anavilasankappati—
ps3.6:9.5: “Tam kho pana dhammavavatthanam evam asevitabbam, evam bhavetabbam, evam bahulikatabbam, evam tadanudhammata, sati upatthapetabba”ti—
ps3.6:10.3: Ye tena nanena samannagata, sabbe te visuddhacitta anavilasankappati—
ps3.6:10.5: “Tam kho pana nanam evam asevitabbam, evam bhavetabbam, evam bahulikatabbam, evam tadanudhammata sati upatthapetabba”ti—
ps3.6:11.3: Ye tena pamojjena samannagata, sabbe te visuddhacitta anavilasankappati—
ps3.6:11.5: “Tam kho pana pamojjam evam asevitabbam, evam bhavetabbam, evam bahulikatabbam, evam tadanudhammata sati upatthapetabba”ti—
ps3.6:12.3: Ye tena pathamena jhanena samannagata, sabbe te visuddhacitta anavilasankappati—
ps3.6:12.5: “Tam kho pana pathamam jhanam evam asevitabbam, evam bhavetabbam, evam bahulikatabbam, evam tadanudhammata sati upatthapetabba”ti—
ps3.6:13.3: Ye tena arahattamaggena samannagata, sabbe te visuddhacitta anavilasankappati—
ps3.6:13.5: “So kho pana arahattamaggo evam asevitabbo, evam bhavetabbo, evam bahulikatabbo, evam tadanudhammata sati upatthapetabba”ti—
ps3.6:14.3: Ya ca iddhi yanca patihariyam, idam vuccati iddhipatihariyam.
